html: (2 Nephi 14:2)."The fruit of the earth shall be excellent and comely." This speaks of a time when the earth will be renewed (the paradisiacal glory in the Millennium) and will be "productive, prosperous, and beautiful." (LDSKJ, Isaiah 4:2, footnote c.) It has also been suggested that the "fruit" could represent either the spiritual food provided by the Redeemer or the blessings of the restored gospel.
